trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to mix the TSort module into an existing class (in this case, Hash). Here, we're treating each key in the hash as a node in the graph, and so we simply alias the required tsort_each_node method to Hash's each_key method. For each key in the hash, the associated value is an array of the node's child nodes. This choice in turn leads to our implementation of the required tsort_each_child method, which fetches the array of child nodes and then iterates over that array using the user-supplied block.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将 TSort 模块混入现有类（在本例中为 Hash ）。在这里，我们将哈希中的每个键都视为图中的一个节点，因此我们只需将所需的 tsort_each_node 方法别名为哈希的each_key方法即可。对于哈希中的每个键，关联的值是该节点的子节点的数组。这种选择反过来导致我们实现所需的 tsort_each_child 方法，该方法获取子节点的数组，然后使用用户提供的块在该数组上进行迭代。

A reader of the method documentation should be able to quickly understand the purpose of the method and how to use it. Providing too little information about the method is not good, but providing unimportant information or unnecessary examples is not good either. Use your judgment about what the user of the method needs to know to use the method correctly.

trans-unit.source: The lowest level emitter is an event based system. Events are sent to a Psych::Emitter object. That object knows how to convert the events to a YAML document. This interface should be used when document format is known in advance or speed is a concern. See Psych::Emitter for more information.
trans-unit.target: 最低级别的发射器是基于事件的系统。事件被发送到 Psych::Emitter 对象。该对象知道如何将事件转换为YAML文档。如果事先知道文档格式或担心速度，则应使用此接口。有关更多信息，请参见 Psych::Emitter 。

trans-unit.source: The lowest level parser should be used when the YAML input is already known, and the developer does not want to pay the price of building an AST or automatic detection and conversion to Ruby objects. See Psych::Parser for more information on using the event based parser.
trans-unit.target: 当已经知道YAML输入并且开发人员不想为构建AST或自动检测并转换为Ruby对象而付出代价时，应使用最低级别的解析器。有关使用基于事件的解析器的更多信息，请参见 Psych::Parser 。

If the hostname in the server certificate is different from address, it can be specified with tls_hostname.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要或需要，其余的参数用于 SMTP 身份验证。 user 是帐户名； secret 是您的密码或其他身份验证令牌；和 authtype 是认证类型的一个：平纹，：登录，或：cram_md5。请参阅概述说明中有关 SMTP 身份验证的讨论。如果 tls_verify 为true，请验证服务器的证书。默认值为true。如果服务器证书中的主机名与 address 不同，则可以使用 tls_hostname 进行指定。

trans-unit.source: The returned hash has two keys :considered and :moved. The hash for :considered lists the number of objects that were considered for movement by the compactor, and the :moved hash lists the number of objects that were actually moved. Some objects can't be moved (maybe they were pinned) so these numbers can be used to calculate compaction efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 返回的哈希值有两个键 :consideration 和 :moved。:consideration的哈希值列出了被压实器考虑移动的对象数量,而 :moved的哈希值则列出了实际被移动的对象数量。有些对象不能被移动(可能是被钉住了),所以这些数字可以用来计算压实效率。

E.g. the OBJECT IDENTIFIER for SHA-1 is 1.3.14.3.2.26 and its sn is “SHA1” and its ln is “sha1”.

trans-unit.source: The transactional behavior ensures that any changes succeed or fail together. This can be used to ensure that the data store is not left in a transitory state, where some values were updated but others were not.
trans-unit.target: 事务性行为确保任何变化都会一起成功或失败。这可以用来确保数据存储不会处于过渡状态,即一些值被更新了,但另一些值没有被更新。

trans-unit.source: The transport layer is responsible for opening client and server network connections and forwarding dRuby request across them. Normally, it uses DRb::DRbMessage internally to manage marshalling and unmarshalling. The transport layer is managed by DRb::DRbProtocol. Multiple protocols can be installed in DRbProtocol at the one time; selection between them is determined by the scheme of a dRuby URI. The default transport protocol is selected by the scheme 'druby:', and implemented by DRb::DRbTCPSocket. This uses plain TCP/IP sockets for communication. An alternative protocol, using UNIX domain sockets, is implemented by DRb::DRbUNIXSocket in the file drb/unix.rb, and selected by the scheme 'drbunix:'. A sample implementation over HTTP can be found in the samples accompanying the main dRuby distribution.
trans-unit.target: 传输层负责打开客户端和服务器网络连接，并在它们之间转发dRuby请求。通常，它内部使用 DRb::DRbMessage 来管理编组和反编组。传输层由 DRb::DRbProtocol 管理。一次可以在 DRbProtocol 中安装多个协议；它们之间的选择由dRuby URI 的方案确定。默认传输协议由方案'druby：'选择，并由 DRb::DRbTCPSocket 。这使用普通的TCP / IP套接字进行通信。使用UNIX域套接字的替代协议由 DRb::DRbUNIXSocket 在文件drb / unix.rb中，并由方案'drbunix：'选择。可以在主要dRuby发行版随附的示例中找到基于HTTP的示例实现。

trans-unit.source: The weight field specifies a relative weight for entries with the same priority. Larger weights SHOULD be given a proportionately higher probability of being selected. The range of this number is 0-65535. Domain administrators SHOULD use Weight 0 when there isn't any server selection to do, to make the RR easier to read for humans (less noisy). Note that it is not widely implemented and should be set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 权重字段指定具有相同优先级的条目的相对权重。权重越大,被选中的概率就越高。这个数字的范围是0-65535。当没有任何服务器选择要做的时候,域管理员should使用权重0,以使RR对人类来说更容易阅读(噪音更小)。需要注意的是,它没有被广泛实施,应该设置为0。

trans-unit.source: The zlib format was designed to be compact and fast for use in memory and on communications channels. The gzip format was designed for single-file compression on file systems, has a larger header than zlib to maintain directory information, and uses a different, slower check method than zlib.
trans-unit.target: zlib格式的设计是为了在内存和通信渠道中使用,紧凑而快速。gzip格式是为文件系统上的单文件压缩而设计的,它有一个比zlib更大的头来保持目录信息,并使用一种不同于zlib的、较慢的检查方法。

trans-unit.source: There are many issues that are stale, with no updates in months or even years. For stale issues in Feedback state, where the feedback has not been received, you can change the status to Closed without adding a note. For stale issues in Assigned state, you can reach out to the assignee and see if they can update the issue. If the assignee is no longer an active committer, remove them as the assignee and change the status to Open.
trans-unit.target: 有很多问题是陈旧的,几个月甚至几年都没有更新。对于反馈状态下的陈旧问题,如果还没有收到反馈,你可以将状态改为关闭,而不需要添加备注。对于分配状态下的陈旧问题,你可以联系受让人,看他们是否可以更新问题。如果受让人不再是活跃的提交者,将其作为受让人移除,并将状态改为开放。

trans-unit.source: There are multiple representations for many values. CRuby always outputs the shortest representation possible.
trans-unit.target: 许多值都有多种表示方法。CRuby总是输出最短的表示方式。

trans-unit.source: There are other methods besides the plain scanners. You can look ahead in the string without actually scanning. You can access the most recent match. You can modify the string being scanned, reset or terminate the scanner, find out or change the position of the scan pointer, skip ahead, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 除了普通扫描器,还有其他方法。你可以在不实际扫描的情况下,提前查看字符串。您可以访问最近的匹配信息。您可以修改正在扫描的字符串,重置或终止扫描器,找出或改变扫描指针的位置,跳过前面,等等。

trans-unit.source: There exists also the possibility to add certificates (instances of OpenSSL::X509::Certificate) besides the timestamping certificate that will be included in the resulting timestamp token if Request#cert_requested? is true. Ideally, one would also include any intermediate certificates (the root certificate can be left out - in order to trust it any verifying party will have to be in its possession anyway). This simplifies validation of the timestamp since these intermediate certificates are “already there” and need not be passed as external parameters to Response#verify anymore, thus minimizing external resources needed for verification.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Request#cert_requested? 是时间戳记证书，该时间戳记证书中将包括时间戳记证书，那么除了添加证书（ OpenSSL::X509::Certificate 实例）之外，还有可能添加证书。是 true 。理想情况下，还应包括任何中间证书（可以省略根证书-为了信任它，无论如何都要拥有任何验证方）。由于这些中间证书“已经存在”，并且不再需要作为外部参数传递给 Response#verify ，因此这简化了时间戳验证，从而最大程度地减少了验证所需的外部资源。

trans-unit.source: There may be an optional maximum field width, expressed as a decimal integer, between the % and the conversion. If no width is given, a default of `infinity' is used (with the exception of the %c specifier; see below). Otherwise, given a field width of n for a given conversion, at most n characters are scanned in processing that conversion. Before conversion begins, most conversions skip whitespace in the input string; this whitespace is not counted against the field width.

trans-unit.source: These characteristics make one-way functions also ideal companions for public key signature algorithms: instead of signing an entire document, first a hash of the document is produced with a considerably faster message digest algorithm and only the few bytes of its output need to be signed using the slower public key algorithm. To validate the integrity of a signed document, it suffices to re-compute the hash and verify that it is equal to that in the signature.
trans-unit.target: 这些特点使单向函数也成为公钥签名算法的理想伙伴:不需要对整个文件进行签名,而是先用速度快得多的消息摘要算法产生一个文件的散列,只需要用速度较慢的公钥算法对其输出的几个字节进行签名。为了验证已签署文件的完整性,只需重新计算哈希值,并核实其与签名中的哈希值相等即可。

trans-unit.source: This assignment is implemented in the Ruby parser. The parser detects 'regexp-literal =~ expression' for the assignment. The regexp must be a literal without interpolation and placed at left hand side.
trans-unit.target: 这个赋值是在Ruby解析器中实现的。解析器检测到 "regexp-literal =~表达式 "来进行赋值。regexp必须是一个没有插值的文字,并且放在左手边。

trans-unit.source: This backport fixes the marshaling of @segments.
trans-unit.target: 这个回溯修正了@segments的marshaling。

trans-unit.source: This backports base_dir which replaces installation path RubyGems 1.8+
trans-unit.target: 这个回溯了base_dir,它取代了RubyGems 1.8+的安装路径。

trans-unit.source: This backports the correct segment generation code from RubyGems 1.4+ by monkeypatching it into the method in RubyGems 1.3.6 and 1.3.7.
trans-unit.target: 这是从RubyGems 1.4+中回溯了正确的段生成代码,通过monkeypatching到RubyGems 1.3.6和1.3.7中的方法。

trans-unit.source: This builds upon the top-level PStore class provided by the library file pstore.rb. Session data is marshalled and stored in a file. File locking and transaction services are provided.
trans-unit.target: 这基于库文件pstore.rb提供的顶级 PStore 类。 Session 数据被编组并存储在文件中。 File 锁定和交易服务。

trans-unit.source: This cache is different from the internal caching that can be done at sub paths of `cache_path` (from API). This can be though as caching by bundler.
trans-unit.target: 这个缓存不同于内部缓存（可以从 API ）在`cache_path`的子路径中完成。这可能就像捆绑程序缓存一样。

trans-unit.source: This can also be used to create symbols that cannot be represented using the :xxx notation.
trans-unit.target: 这也可以用来创建不能使用 :xxx 表示法表示的符号。

trans-unit.source: This can be used in contexts like OpenSSL::X509::ExtensionFactory.config=
trans-unit.target: 可以在诸如 OpenSSL::X509::ExtensionFactory.config= 上下文中使用

trans-unit.source: This can raise IO exceptions based on the access, or availability of the file. A ConfigError exception may be raised depending on the validity of the data being configured.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会基于文件的访问或可用性而引发 IO 异常。甲 ConfigError 异常可能取决于所配置的数据的有效性提高。

trans-unit.source: This class allows idiomatic calculations on long or infinite sequences, as well as chaining of calculations without constructing intermediate arrays.
trans-unit.target: 该类允许对长序列或无限序列进行习惯性计算,也可以在不构建中间数组的情况下进行链式计算。

trans-unit.source: This class contains all of the logic for determining the next version of a Gem to update to based on the requested level (patch, minor, major). Primarily designed to work with Resolver which will provide it the list of available dependency versions as found in its index, before returning it to to the resolution engine to select the best version.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含所有逻辑，用于根据请求的级别（补丁，次要，主要）确定要更新到的下一个Gem版本。主要设计为与 Resolver 配合使用，它将在索引中找到可用的依赖版本列表，然后再将其返回到解析引擎以选择最佳版本。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates a dependency resolver. The resolver is responsible for determining which set of dependencies to activate, with feedback from the {#specification_provider}
trans-unit.target: 这个类封装了一个依赖关系解析器。该解析器负责根据{#specification_provider}的反馈,决定激活哪一组依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: This class handles only scanner events, which are dispatched in the 'right' order (same with input).
trans-unit.target: 该类只处理扫描器事件,这些事件以 "正确 "的顺序发送(与输入相同)。

trans-unit.source: This class implements a pretty printing algorithm. It finds line breaks and nice indentations for grouped structure.
trans-unit.target: 这个类实现了一个漂亮的打印算法。它为分组结构找到换行符和漂亮的缩进符。

trans-unit.source: This class implements the File Transfer Protocol. If you have used a command-line FTP program, and are familiar with the commands, you will be able to use this class easily. Some extra features are included to take advantage of Ruby's style and strengths.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现 File 传输协议。如果您使用了命令行 FTP 程序，并且熟悉了这些命令，则可以轻松使用此类。其中包括一些额外的功能，以利用Ruby的样式和优点。

trans-unit.source: This class is supposed to be wrapper over the existing gem installation infra but currently it itself handles everything as the Source's subclasses (e.g. Source::RubyGems) are heavily dependent on the Gemfile.
trans-unit.target: 这个类应该是现有的 gem 安装信息的封装器,但目前它自己处理所有的事情,因为 Source 的子类(例如 Source::RubyGems)严重依赖于 Gemfile。

trans-unit.source: This class is the access to openssl's ENGINE cryptographic module implementation.
trans-unit.target: 这个类是访问openssl的ENGINE加密模块的实现。

trans-unit.source: This class is used as a return value from ObjectSpace::reachable_objects_from.
trans-unit.target: 此类用作 ObjectSpace::reachable_objects_from 的返回值。

trans-unit.source: This class is used internally by DRbObject. The user does not normally need to deal with it directly.
trans-unit.target: 此类由 DRbObject 内部使用。用户通常不需要直接处理它。

trans-unit.source: This class maintains a pool of connections, to reduce the overhead of starting and closing down connections for each method call.
trans-unit.target: 该类维护了一个连接池,以减少每次方法调用时启动和关闭连接的开销。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a complete interface to CSV files and data. It offers tools to enable you to read and write to and from Strings or IO objects, as needed.
trans-unit.target: 此类为 CSV 文件和数据提供了完整的界面。它提供了一些工具，使您能够根据需要读写字符串或 IO 对象。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the base to build source plugins All the method here are required to build a source plugin (except `uri_hash`, `gem_install_dir`; they are helpers).
trans-unit.target: 这个类提供了构建源码插件的基础 这里的所有方法都是构建源码插件所需要的(除了`uri_hash`,`gem_install_dir`,它们是辅助工具)。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a message which exists on the POP server. Instances of this class are created by the POP3 class; they should not be directly created by the user.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示POP服务器上存在的消息。此类的实例由 POP3 类创建；它们不应由用户直接创建。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a response received by the SMTP server. Instances of this class are created by the SMTP class; they should not be directly created by the user. For more information on SMTP responses, view Section 4.2 of RFC 5321
trans-unit.target: 此类表示 SMTP 服务器收到的响应。此类的实例由 SMTP 类创建；它们不应由用户直接创建。有关 SMTP 响应的更多信息，请参阅RFC 5321的4.2节

trans-unit.source: This class represents queues of specified size capacity. The push operation may be blocked if the capacity is full.
trans-unit.target: 该类表示指定大小容量的队列。如果容量已满,推送操作可能会被阻止。

trans-unit.source: This class watches for termination of multiple threads. Basic functionality (wait until specified threads have terminated) can be accessed through the class method ThreadsWait::all_waits. Finer control can be gained using instance methods.
trans-unit.target: 此类监视多个线程的终止。可以通过类方法 ThreadsWait::all_waits 访问基本功能（等待指定的线程终止）。可以使用实例方法获得更精细的控制。
